name: BEAM (itch) (willow123amp)
description: You are a moonbeam scout, sent out by The Man in the Moon to find lost moonbeam scouts out in space. While searching for them, you have must avoid yellow stars, red decoy health packs, and destroy space rocks using your beam power. Pick up pink lights to regain health. Use WASD to move and SPACE to shoot. Please use the fullscreen button on the bottom right to preview whole game.
